definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: MissionThe mission of the EV Ministry is to spread the good news of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 福传委员会的使命是要传扬主耶稣基督救恩的好讯息。

sentences.english: One generation will commend your works to another; they will tell of your mighty acts.
sentences.chinese: 这代要对那代颂赞你的作为，也要传扬你的大能。

sentences.english: This peace of God is not a mere abstraction advocated by preachers and theologians.
sentences.chinese: 神的平安并非由传道人和神学家所传扬的抽象概念。

sentences.english: Sing to the Lord , praise his name; proclaim his salvation day after day.
sentences.chinese: 要向耶和华歌唱，称颂他的名，天天传扬他的救恩。

sentences.english: Speak, ye that ride on white asses, ye that sit in judgment, and walk by the way.
sentences.chinese: 骑白驴的，坐绣花毯子的，行路的，你们都当传扬。

sentences.english: A voice is announcing from Dan, proclaiming disaster from the hills of Ephraim.
sentences.chinese: 有声音从但传扬，从以法莲山报祸患。

sentences.english: O Lord, open my lips, and my mouth will declare your praise.
sentences.chinese: 主阿，求你使我嘴唇张开，我的口便传扬赞美你的话。

sentences.english: National hero is the main eulogizing object in mythic epics and folk stories.
sentences.chinese: 民族英雄是神话史诗与民间故事歌颂传扬的主要对象。

sentences.english: With my lips I recount all the laws that come from your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我用嘴唇传扬你口中的一切典章。

sentences.english: I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 我必不致死，仍要存活，并要传扬耶和华的作为。

sentences.english: This "urban card "of the peony fair has already spread the graceful name of Luoyang everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 牡丹花会这张“城市名片”已把洛阳的美名四海传扬。

sentences.english: The heavens declare the glory of God and the firmament shows His handiwork.
sentences.chinese: 诸天述说神的荣耀，穹苍传扬祂的手段。

sentences.english: This service of the promotion of the Revelation of Bahá'u'lláh is the most confirmed service.
sentences.chinese: 传扬巴哈欧拉天启是最受确认的服务。

sentences.english: This is one of the least evangelized areas of South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 这是南韩境内其中一个福音最少被传扬的地区。

sentences.english: Sing praises to the LORD, enthroned in Zion; proclaim among the nations what he has done.
sentences.chinese: 应当歌颂居锡安的耶和华，将他所行的传扬在众民中。

sentences.english: So David's fame spread throughout every land, and the Lord made all the nations fear him.
sentences.chinese: 于是大卫的名传扬到列国，耶和华使列国都惧怕他。

definition: to proclaim/to make public or well known
news pass quickly from mouth to mouth (idiom)/an infectious disease spreads quickly (old meaning)
pinyin: yi1 chuan2 shi2 , shi2 chuan2 bai3

definition: known by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
to lecture on doctrine/to expound the wisdom of ancient sages/to preach/a sermon
